title: Who Dares to be a Millionaire?
featuredTitle: Who Dares to be a Millionaire?
description: Answer questions to win a million dollars… if you dare.
quote: I didn’t come to play, I came to win. Now, let’s play!
altHero: Philip J. Fry and Morbo sit on a game show stage
alt2: the Planet Express crew in the audience
alt3: Fry struggles with the trivia question “What tool is used to hammer a nail?” given the following choices: a hammer or a nail
alt4: the set lights are red and Fry’s chair has lifted off the ground to head out of frame
